verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'll show you a mystery; (echo)
We shall not all sleep; (echo)
But we'll be changed to His image; (echo)
In the twinkling of an eye.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We shall be changed;
We shall be changed;
We're going to be changed from mortal
To immortality,
In the twinkling of an eye.
The trumpet shall sound; (echo)
The dead shall be raised; (echo)
And we shall be immortal; (echo)
And death is swallowed up in victory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh death, where is thy sting?
Oh death, where is thy sting?
Oh grave, where is thy victory?
Oh death, where is thy sting?
Death is swallowed up in victory.
